SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.jalapeno.annotations
Annotation Type Relationship

@Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Relationship

Used for specifying relationships in Cache. Cache supports two types of relationships, ONE_TO_MANY, and MANY_TO_ONE. Aside for inverse field and class, one can also specify whether the underlying Cache relationship is a parent-child relationship

Optional Element Summary
 FetchType fetch
           
 java.lang.String inverseClass
           
 java.lang.String inverseProperty
           
 boolean parentChild
           
 RelationshipType type
           
 

type

public abstract RelationshipType type
Default:
ONE_TO_MANY

parentChild

public abstract boolean parentChild
Default:
false

inverseClass
